name: Jet Punch

name: Spicy Extract

name: Spin Out

name: Population Bomb

name: Ice Spinner

name: Glaive Rush

name: Revival Blessing

name: Salt Cure

name: Triple Dive

name: Mortal Spin

name: Doodle

name: Fillet Away

name: Kowtow Cleave

name: Flower Trick

name: Torch Song

name: Aqua Step

name: Raging Bull

name: Make It Rain
desc: The user attacks by throwing out a mass of coins. This also lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat. Money is earned after the battle.

name: Pound
desc: The target is physically pounded with a long tail, a foreleg, or the like.

name: Pound
desc: The target is physically pounded with a long tail, a foreleg, or the like.

name: Ruination

name: Electro Drift

name: Shed Tail
desc: The user creates a substitute for itself using its own HP before switching places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

name: Chilly Reception

name: Tidy Up

name: Snowscape

name: Pounce
desc: The user attacks by pouncing on the target. This also lowers the target’s Speed stat.

name: Trailblaze

name: Chilling Water

name: Hyper Drill

name: Twin Beam
desc: The user shoots mystical beams from its eyes to inflict damage. The target is hit twice in a row.

name: Rage Fist

name: Armor Cannon

name: Bitter Blade

name: Double Shock

name: Gigaton Hammer
desc: The user swings its whole body around to attack with its huge hammer. This move can’t be used twice in a row.

name: Comeuppance

name: Aqua Cutter
desc: The user expels pressurized water to cut at the target like a blade. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.
